questions.description: Explain photosynthesis and write chemical equation
Calculate area of circle with radius r = 7.5 cm
Balance chemical equation Fe + O₂ → Fe₂O₃
Ball thrown upward - find max height and time
Describe atomic structure, atomic number, mass number
State Newton's Second Law and mathematical form

human_feedback.Q1: Perfect application of power rule. All steps shown clearly.
human_feedback.Q2: Correct integration method. Minor formatting issue in final answer.
human_feedback.Q3: Good explanation. Missing detail about light/dark reactions.
human_feedback.Q4: Correct formula used. Accurate calculation with proper units.
human_feedback.Q5: Perfectly balanced equation. Systematic approach shown.
human_feedback.Q6: Correct equations. Small rounding error in final height.
human_feedback.Q7: Comprehensive description. Diagram could be more detailed.
human_feedback.Q8: Correct factorization method. Both roots found accurately.
human_feedback.Q9: Correct formulas. Small rounding inconsistency in Kelvin.
human_feedback.Q10: Perfect statement of Newton's Second Law.
